question: Now the technology has improved a lot. The muslim dates can be calculated in advance correctly. Then why are the muslim still looking at the moon to confirm the fasting days.
answer:
QUESTION
The worst thing is that different countries are celebrating the fasting festival in different days due to uncertainity of moon visibility. Anything can be done to resolve this problem!
